layers.name: Forest composition Switzerland
layers.description: 10m resolution map of the forest composition (percentage of broadleaved as opposed to coniferous trees) in Switzerland
layers.description_short: 10m resolution map of the forest composition
layers.description_long: 10m resolution map of the forest composition. Data is between 0 and 100, representing the fraction of broadleaved trees (as opposed to coniferous). NA is no forest. Study restricted to vegetation above 3m.
layers.data_source_attribution: Data obtained from Christian Ginzler, WSL (christian.ginzler@wsl.ch), 27 July 2022.
layers.data_source_description: Data obtained from Christian Ginzler, WSL (christian.ginzler@wsl.ch), 27 July 2022.
